questions.question: What is the dominant color of the upholstery fabric covering the entire sofa?
What is the apparent texture of the fabric covering the sofa's cushions and body?
Describe the overall shape and style of this upholstered seating piece?
What material appears to comprise the legs supporting the sofa structure?
Considering the visible design elements, what is the general style of this furniture piece?
What color are the legs of the sofa visible in the side profile view?
Based on the visible stitching, what type of cushions are used in the backrest?
What is the apparent height of the sofa's backrest relative to the seat cushions?
Describe the visible armrests; are they tall or short, padded or not?
Judging by the visible seams, what is the construction style of the seat cushions?
What is the visible shape of the seat cushions from the side profile?
Observing the legs, what appears to be the style of their design; tapered, squared, etc?
What is the apparent thickness of the sofa's cushions; thin, medium, or thick?
What is the apparent style of the armrests; rolled, straight, flared etc.?
Describe the overall visual impression of the sofa's upholstery; sleek, rough, etc. ?
